## This is an English community. - Speak only English in character and out of character. - We cannot moderate other languages, nor do we want people to be left out of conversations.
## Why We are not currently recruiting staff fluent in other languages to moderate them. Translation tools can be unreliable and are not integrated well into the game.
## Non-English Options There are many servers that allow or focus on other languages. You are highly encouraged to play on servers that allow languages you are fluent in for the best experience.
